headline: Talk of an AI bubble is just 'ridiculous,' this strategist says
summary: Investors are still going back and forth over whether there is an AI bubble surrounding markets (^DJI, ^IXIC, ^GSPC) or whether it is going to pop soon. One Wall Street analyst finds the chatter over the existence of an AI bubble "ridiculous." Humilis Investment Strategies CEO and Chief Investment Officer Brian Belski sits down with Market Catalysts host Julie Hyman to explain his thoughts on the AI trade, dynamic changes since the Dot-Com Bubble of the 1990s, and his view on the Magnificent Seven tech stocks. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.

headline: Oracle Stock: Prepare For Q2 Earnings With A Short-Term, High-Risk Spread Trade
summary: Oracle is due to report fiscal second-quarter earnings Wednesday after the market close, and the options market is pricing in a 10.5% move in either direction.  Oracle stock has consistently stayed above the lower end of the expected range for the last seven earnings announcements.  Let's analyze how to structure an option trade that fits the view that 1) it's likely Oracle stock won't fall beyond its expected range and 2) the response to the earnings report is likely to be positive.
